mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number caseeNumber, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time handoverTime, p10_liqui_transfer_record.STATUS, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.create_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id liquiTransferRecordId, DATE_FORMAT(substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d') AS applicationSubmissionTime, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id, entrustedIns.ins_name entrustedInsName, entrustedOutles.outles_name entrustedOutlesName, p10_casee.executed_name as executorSubjectName, p10_casee.applicant_name as applicantSubjectName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution AS entrustedIns ON entrustedIns.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles AS entrustedOutles ON entrustedOutles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_casee.casee_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id ORDER BY p10_liqui_transfer_record.create_time DESC LIMIT 10000 ) AS a GROUP BY a.casee_id, a.project_id, a.node_id HAVING a.del_flag = 0
and (a.entrusted_ins_id = #{login.insId} or a.entrust_ins_id = #{login.insId})
and (a.entrusted_outles_id = #{login.outlesId} or a.entrust_outles_id = #{login.outlesId})
and a.status = #{query.status}
and a.executorSubjectName like concat('%', #{query.subjectName}, '%') or a.applicantSubjectName like concat('%', #{query.subjectName}, '%')
AND a.insName LIKE concat( '%', #{query.insName}, '%' )
AND a.outlesName LIKE concat( '%', #{query.outlesName}, '%' )
AND a.handover_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.status, p10_liqui_transfer_record.remark, DATE_FORMAT(substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d') AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, p10_task_node.node_id, p10_casee.applicant_name AS applicantSubjectName, p10_casee.executed_name AS executorSubjectName, p10_casee.judge_name, p10_court.court_name FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id LEFT JOIN p10_court ON p10_casee.court_id = p10_court.court_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag=0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number caseeNumber, p10_liqui_transfer_record.*, DATE_FORMAT(substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d') AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, entrustedIns.ins_name entrustedInsName, entrustedOutles.outles_name entrustedOutlesName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution AS entrustedIns ON entrustedIns.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles AS entrustedOutles ON entrustedOutles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag = 0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id = #{caseeId} AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id = #{projectId} AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id = #{nodeId}

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, DATE_FORMAT(substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d') AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag=0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.*, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, p10_casee.executed_name as executorSubjectName, p10_casee.applicant_name as applicantSubjectName, DATE_FORMAT(substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ), '%Y-%m-%d') AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile FROM p10_liqui_transfer_record LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_casee.casee_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.paifu_project_id =#{projectId} AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.`status` IN(1,3)

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.* FROM p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re INNER JOIN p10_liqui_transfer_record ON p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.liqui_transfer_record_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id INNER JOIN p10_assets_re ON p10_assets_liqui_transfer_record_re.assets_re_id = p10_assets_re.assets_re_id WHERE p10_assets_re.assets_id = #{assetsId} AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.paifu_project_id = #{paifuProjectId}
